You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image is a black and white photograph featuring an elderly man sitting on a bench on a city street. He has a white beard and is holding onto a walking frame. Next to him is a sign that reads "The Lord Jesus Christ will RETURN PLEASE READ Revelation Luke Psalm" with specific chapter and verse numbers listed. In the background, there are people walking, including a child. The setting appears to be a public, urban area.
